name: Wiggly Wonka Man
description:
Go wiggly through all of the fun physics-based levels! WIGGLE TO VICTORY!!!

Controls - 

  • Right Mouse Button - Grab with Right Hand
  • Left Mouse Button - Grab with Left Hand
  • A/D - Left/Right
  • Space Bar - Jump
  • Mouse Position + Holding Mouse Button - Hand Position

To extract the source files, you will need 7zip.
